        Returns:

      • playTournament

        public void playTournament(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> p_mapFiles,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> p_strategies,
                           int p_numOfGames,
                           int p_numOfTurns)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Conducts the tournament as per the mentioned arguments.
        Parameters:
        p_mapFiles - List of map files to play on
        p_strategies - List of player strategies
        p_numOfGames - Number of games to play
        p_numOfTurns - Number of turns to play in each game
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Displays the result of the tournament
        Parameters:
        p_winner - HashMap representing the winner of the game indexed based on the number of the game.
        p_maps - List of maps used to play the tournament.
